subject: Immediate installation of booth and computer in exempted lanes
text: #Rrdfi 7cf TuTHIf gifaasrut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (73v 4artT 3 <TTTf TATa) Extn 2223/2318/2468/2553 HT National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/3/02-03/CMD-CO/Policy on Toll(Vol-V August 2004 CIRCULAR NO:_NHAI LCOMMERCLAL_OPERATION 45 Sub: Immediate Installation of booth and computers in exempted lanes It has been observed that in some of the plazas, there is no booth in exempted lanels): Consequently, the vehicles  passing through such lanes are recorded either manually o are not being recorded at all. It has been decided that (a) a booth will be installed in each of such lanes; and (b) a computer and printer will also be provided there: 2. For procurement of booth(s), the Project Director may approach  supplier of other booths and a variation is permitted to this extent Or may invite offers from minimum three parties and ensure immediate installation: 3. For installation of computer and printer, the Project Director may send a proposalismediately to IT Division so that they can make necessary arrangement in this regard: 4. All must be made within 30 days from the date of this circular arrangement and compliance may be reported to Head Office: 5. For future planning and procurement fOr plaza to be constructed; all lanes must have a provision of a booth with computer and printer: This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (M M Lohia) General Manager(CO) To All CMUs | PIUs Copy to 1 All Members/ CGMs 2. All GMs 3. PS to Chairman Z:ImmlohialeelamlRead Message Inbox_files Policyontoll Policy on toll (6) doc 77J NHAL 16th
